parameters.name: NewResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the new resource group.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the resource.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of resource. Valid values:

*   **loadbalancer**: a Network Load Balancer (NLB) instance
*   **securitypolicy**: a security policy
*   **servergroup**: a server group
